page.title: 05GOBOWEN SCHOOL,NR.OSWESTRY
page.content: Gobowen is a small village and it has an{infant and junior school.}It is quite big with eight classes,five junior and three infant. There are two caretakers,five canteen staff and a secretary. A large hall for physical education is well equipped and there is a large sports field alongside the building. There are over 220 pupils. Mr Jones the{headmaster}says that the school is quite big."We have a staff room and a library which is used as an office as well." He came to Gobowen school to be a Headmaster in 1976. The school opened in 1907 so it is nearly 80 years old. {Mr Jones}enjoys reading, fishing, playing golf, and squash.He would not like another job but he has been headmaster in another school.He loves it when children do good work.
